English: Hello again, ${FIRST_NAME}! I hope you had a good week.
I am back to complete the final round of questionnaires for the experiment.

text.English: Please take the time to fill out the following survey thoughtfully and thoroughly.
text.Deutsch: Bitte nehmen Sie sich die Zeit, die folgende Umfrage bedacht und vollständig auszufüllen.

inputPrompt.English: Enter the survey code that you receive at the end of the survey to continue. (ABCDE, 12345)
inputPrompt.Deutsch: Geben Sie den Umfrage-Code ein, den Sie am Ende der Umfrage erhalten, um fortzufahren. (ABCDE, 12345)

English: And with that, we have finally come to the end of the experiment!
It was great interacting with you, and I appreciate the effort you put into your responses.
